structure.unit: ADMINISTRATION OF TRUSTS -- LEGAL INVESTMENTS -- UNIFORM PRINCIPAL AND INCOME ACT

law.catch_line: Application of KRS 386.450 to 386.504 to trusts.
law.text: The provisions of KRS 386.450 to 386.504 shall apply to all trusts administered under Kentucky law, except as otherwise specifically provided in the instrument creating the trust, regardless of when created.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 3, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 158, sec. 27, effective January 1, 2005.
